channel.title: Effective Altruism on Serhat Giydiren
channel.description: Recent content in Effective Altruism on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 22, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on the 8th chapter of the Effective Altruism Handbook, focusing on the practical application of EA principles in career choices, donations, and community involvement to maximize positive impact.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 16, 2025
item.description: Completed Chapter 7 of the Effective Altruism Handbook, ‘What do you think?’, which emphasizes the importance of critical thinking and actively contributing personal insights to the community discourse.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 10, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on AI risks, including misalignment, misuse, and s-risks, and an exploration of emergent misalignment due to prompt sensitivity in LLMs.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 9, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on longtermism and its moral implications for the future, and a paper on teaching models to verbalize reward hacking in Chain-of-Thought reasoning.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 25, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 4 of the Effective Altruism Handbook, ‘Our Final Century?’, which examines existential risks, particularly human-made pandemics, and strategies for biosecurity.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 18, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 3 of the Effective Altruism Handbook, ‘Radical Empathy’, which explores impartial care and extending empathy to non-human animals.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 15, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 2 of the Effective Altruism Handbook, focusing on the significant differences in the impact of interventions aimed at alleviating global poverty.

item.title: AI Safety Diary: August 8, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on exploring the ‘Effectiveness Mindset’ from the Effective Altruism Handbook, in the context of AI safety and governance.
